PageWidgetPortable.Title: Fechar unidade de abastecimento
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_MF_CONTROLEABASTECIMENTO.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>true</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>true</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>(A.STATUS = 2) AND ((A.CENTROMANUTENCAO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM MA_CENTROSMANUTENCAO WHERE FILIAL = @FILIAL)) OR (@FILIAL = 0))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t4678_at7053_hs7ea0ddb9.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
